shortForecast: Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
name: Tonight
detailedForecast: A chance of snow showers before 10pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 12. Wind chill values as low as -1. Northwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.
